tax_rules.eu_licensed: Gambling winnings are generally tax-free for recreational Australian players
tax_rules.non_eu_licensed: Gambling winnings are generally not taxable for casual players
tax_rules.declaration_note: Professional gamblers may need to declare winnings as income
tax_rules.example: You win $50,000 at any casino. Generally no tax is due for recreational players.

legal_framework.player_responsibility: Playing at offshore casinos is not illegal for players, but operators cannot legally target Australians

ui_labels.sources_intro: This article is based on information from the following authoritative sources:
ui_labels.disclaimer_text: Gambling is only permitted for persons aged 18 and over. Gamble responsibly and set limits.
ui_labels.disclaimer_full: Gambling is only permitted for persons aged 18 and over. Gamble responsibly and set limits. If you feel your gambling is becoming problematic, contact Gambling Help on 1800 858 858.
